name: Fluffination
description:
Made for Legend of Runeterra's "LoRFluftFeudcontest". I thought the idea of playing as a Poro recruited by Vex and Viego would be super adorable as he really would just want to eat some tasty poro Snax.

I thought that Chelsea Du and Servando Lupin's Poro designs were perfect to star the show. With the Sentinel Poro preventing Poroiego from being selfish with all his snacks.

All the Poro Sound Effects are from "Legends of Runeterra"

Music used from Riot Studios are

Viego's Champion Theme

Lulu and Shaco's Quirky Encounter

Hollow by Hanz

This is made as a fan game of the Runeterra verse belonging to Riot Studios.
